title: cultural_data_Memphis_Brooks_Museum_of_Art
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tristaninteractive.brooks_moa.
Application Name: Memphis Brooks Museum of Art.
Number of Reviews: .
Application Description: The Memphis Brooks Museum of Art is the largest art museum in a three-state region of the American South. Download the Brooks app to stay connected and up to date on current exhibitions and special events. Use it to plan upcoming visits; to listen to expert insight from curators, educators, and art world insiders; and to discover selected works from the permanent collection and special exhibitions. Fuel your children’s creativity via the Brooks Kids! section of the app. This special kids-only section includes a puzzle game, audio tours presented in English and Spanish, and a coloring section where your child can create art inspired by works on view at the Brooks.Over 9,000 works make up the Brooks’ permanent collection including ancient works from Greece, Rome, and the Ancient Americas; Renaissance masterpieces from Italy; English portraiture; American painting and decorative arts; contemporary art; and a survey of African art.For more information on the Brooks, and all other exhibitions and programs, call 901.544.6200 or visit www.brooksmuseum.orgRead moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 1081.00.

First Page Reviews: Nice idea Nice idea, but the audio stops when the screen blanks. Also, the clips don't seem to be complete. ! They have this app in the museum too but its easier to get on your phone first, you will have to do a download after you install Cash Carlton Brooks.
